metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1990 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in ndlc_remove in drivers/nfc/st-nci/ndlc.cin the Linux Kernel. This flaw could allow an attacker to crash the systemdue to a race problem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
